resources.string: We need some permissions to continue
Videona needs some permissions to use the camera or record audio.\nWithout them Videona can\'t continue and will be closed.
We need those permissions to take awesome videos with Videona!
Something bad happened. Impossible to record video, try again
Ups, we couldn\'t share this video. Sorry
Press back again to exit the edit room
Oops! Something bad happened. Try to add again
Do you want to discard these videos from the time line?
Deleted videos from project. Record or add new videos
Please, record or add new videos
Please, select an instant time to razor this video
Clear videos from project, record or add new videos
Permanently delete this/these selected files from your terminal?
This video is not valid. Please, select another one
Rate our app or send us an email if you have any suggestions.
Are you sure do you want to quit?
Having fun with Videona, the best app to edit videos!!! Try it!!!\nhttps://goo.gl/YudZYP

Record, edit, share…Three simple things you will like to do as soon as you have the new Videona App in your smartphone. From now you can enjoy the perfect tool to create videos with super cool effects and filters, add music and share your creations with your favorites socials networks. 


Before Videona, there are a group of spanish young enterpreneurs with the will of building the best smartphone video editor application. Our application want to break the edition barrier and be a change in the audiovisual world and smartphones.

1. WEBSITE OWNERSHIP\n\n
VIDEONA SOCIALMEDIA S.L. (hereinafter, Videona) is the holder of the mobile app web
(hereinafter, App) and the web pages www.videona.es and www.videona.com (hereinafter,
the Web Site and jointly referred as the Platform). Its registered office address is c/ María
Blanchard, 2 – portal 7, bajo D, 28232, Las Rozas de Madrid, Madrid (Spain) and its tax
number is B87047171.\n\n
You may contact Videona at the following contact details:\n\n
Telf. +34 91 449 64 81\n\n
Email:info@videona.com\n\n
The domain(s) name(s) through which you have accessed the Web Site or the App is (are)
held by Videona. Such domain(s) name(s) shall not be used in connection with other
contents, products and/or services not owned by Videona nor in any way that may cause
confusion among end users or discredit Videona.\n\n
2. OBJECT\n\n
This Legal Notice contains all the terms and conditions which regulate the access,
navigation and use of the Platform and its content. Notwithstanding anything herein, the
foregoing is without prejudice to the fact that Videona may establish particular terms and
conditions which regulate the use, provision and/or contracting of products or services
which are offered to Users through the Platform.\n\n
If the use, the provision and/or the contracting of products or services is offered through
the Platform, the mere fact of being used and/or requested by the User will imply, equally,
the acceptance without reservation of the corresponding established specific conditions
which will also form an integral part of this Legal Notice.\n\n
Videona reserves the right to exclusively offer certain products or services to the
registered Users, subject to the acceptance of the particular conditions that may apply.
Videona reserves the right to modify, terminate, discontinue, suspend or interrupt,
temporarily or permanently, at any time and without notice, the access to the products,
services and/or contents of the Platform, as well as to its configuration, without the User´s
right to claim or request damages of any kind; specifically, the above may be carried out
as a result of business decisions, maintenance and fixing operations, update, upgrade
and/or adjusting processes to technical, operational and/or legal changes. Upon such
termination, the prohibitions, restrictions and limitations herein contained and/or contained
in any applicable particular terms and conditions will remain valid.\n\n
3. WEBSITE USE AND ACCESS\n\n
Any of the following acts implies the acceptance by the User without reservation of each
and all the rules stated in this Legal Notice: (i) downloading the App, (ii) accessing the
Platform and/or using its content, (iii) filling out forms through the Platform, (iv) sending
requests for information or complaints, (v) contracting offers and (vi) in general, all acts of
a similar nature to (specially with they are carried out through the Platform). You must
therefore read and understand the content of this Legal Notice.\n\n
Unless otherwise stated in this Legal Notice or in any particular terms and conditions, the
access and use of the Platform by Users is free of charge. However, Videona reserves the
right, in its sole discretion, to request any economic consideration for the access and the
use of the products or services provided through the Platform. Should this occur, Videona
shall provide Users with the applicable particular terms and conditions and the relevant
notice, so that Users may be able to voluntarily terminate the access and/or use of those
services that imply the payment of the said economic consideration. Once the applicable
particular terms and conditions come into force, the access and/or use of the products or
services by the User will imply the User´s acceptance, without reservation, of the
respective particular terms and conditions. \n\n
The use, the provision and/or the contracting of the products and services offered by
Videona may be subject to the previous acceptance of formal requisites such as the filling
out of corresponding forms, payment of costs and/or the previous acceptance of the
specific terms and conditions which apply to it.\n\n
In every case, the access, the navigation and the use of the Platform and the use or the
contracting of the services or products offered through the Platform is the sole and
exclusive responsibility of the User. The User is therefore bound to diligently and faithfully
observe any additional instructions given by Videona or by Videona’s authorised
employees in relation to the Platform and its contents’ use.\n\n
The User is therefore bound to use the contents, products and services in a diligent,
correct and lawful manner, complying with the current legislation. In particular, the User
agrees to abstain from:\n\n
(i) Using it in any manner which is against the law or that offends reasonable standards
of general public morality, ethics or public order, or which is in any way contrary to
the instructions of Videona.\n\n
(ii) Using it in a way which harms the legitimate rights of third parties\n\n
4. REGISTRATION\n\n
If the User is obliged to register for using and/or contracting a product or service offered
through the Platform, the User will be under an obligation to provide accurate information,
guaranteeing the authenticity of all the data provided at the time of filling out the pre-
established forms required to access the corresponding products or services. If, as a result
of the User’s registration, a password is issued, the User thereby is bound to use it
diligently and to keep such password secret. Consequently, Users shall be responsible for
the adequate custody and confidentiality of all identifying data and/or passwords which are
given to them by Videona, and are bound to not allow or facilitate its use by third parties,
temporarily or permanently, nor to provide access to others. The use and/or contracting of
products or services by illegitimate third parties acquired due to a negligent use or misuse
of a password given to a third party and/or the loss of the password by the User will be
entirely the responsibility of the User.\n\n
Furthermore, it is the responsibility of the User to immediately notify Videona of any
circumstances which may lead to the improper use of identifying data and/or passwords,
such as theft, loss or non-authorised access, so that Videona can proceed with immediate
cancellation. Until the circumstances are communicated to Videona, Videona will be
exempt from any responsibility which could derive from the improper use of the identifying
data or use or misuse of passwords by third parties.\n\n
5. RESPONSIBILITIES, WARRANTIES AND DISCLAIMERS\n\n
The Platform may contain information, opinions, advice, warnings, and statements
provided by different information and content sources as well as any User of the Platform.
Videona shall have no liability for Users´ decisions based on the information provided by or
through the Platform. Any information posted on the Platform is intended for general
purposes only. Videona does not represent or endorse the accuracy or reliability of any
information or contents. Consequently, Videona does not warrant the timeliness, reliability,
use or veracity of the information, sequence, accuracy or completeness of such
information nor the results obtained from the given use of such information and shall have
no liability to the User including in the event of defamatory, offensive or illicit materials,
content or information.\n\n
Videona makes no representations and, to the fullest extent permitted by law, disclaims all
warranties, whether express or implied, related to the Platform. The Platform and any
content, product and/or service contained therein is provided “as is”. The User
acknowledges and voluntarily agrees that the use of the information published and/or
provided with regard to the Platform products or services is carried out at his/her own risk.
In detail, to the maximum extent permitted by law, Videona is not responsible and does not
guarantee:\n\n
(i) The adequacy of the Platform or the contents published on it to the law of your
country of residence or from which you access or use the Platform.\n\n
(ii) The continuity of the Platform’s contents and/or the unavailability or accessibility of
the Platform or its technical continuity.\n\n
(iii) The existence of interruptions or errors in accessing the Platform, as well as
technical problems during connexion via the Internet.\n\n
(iv) The lack of errors in its contents, services or products.\n\n
(v) The absence of viruses and/or other harmful elements in the Platform or server
which hosts it.\n\n
(vi) The lack of vulnerability of the Platform and/or the impregnability of the security
measures adopted by the same.\n\n
(vii) The reliability and/or fitness for a particular purpose of the Platform, the products or
services provided and the information published with regard to the products or
services.\n\n
(viii) The lack of usability, profit or performance of the Platform’s contents or services.\n\n
(ix) The loss or damages caused to any User or third party as a result of a person
breaching the conditions, terms of use or instructions given by Videona on the
Platform o through the infringement of the Platform’s security measures.\n\n
(x) Any other damages of any nature which may be caused by reasons pertaining to the
Platform not functioning or to the defective functioning of the Platform or any other
website or with regard to any links which fail.\n\n
Notwithstanding the above, Videona declares that has adopted all reasonable measures,
within its grasp and within the state of technology, in order to guarantee the Platform
operation of and to avoid the existence and transmission of viruses and other damaging
components which could potentially harm Users.\n\n
Videona has applied all reasonable measures to avoid errors in the contents published in
the Platform. All contents offered through the Platform are updated and Videona reserves
the right to modify them at any time. Videona will not be held responsible for the
consequences which may derive from any errors in any contents published by third parties
on the Platform and that Videona has not been informed of.\n\n
To the fullest extent permitted by law, Videona will not be responsible for profits lost,
revenues, or data, financial losses or indirect, special, consequential, exemplary, or
punitive damages. In any event, the total liability of Videona for any claims under these
terms, including for any implied warranties, is limited to the amount paid, if any, by the
User to use the Platform. In all cases, Videona will not be liable for any loss or damage
that is not reasonably foreseeable.\n\n
6. PROHIBITIONS AND RESTRICTIONS\n\n
Any communication or transmission of contents to the Platform which infringes the rights of
third parties and/or the content that is threatening, obscene, defamatory, pornographic,
xenophobic, which undermines personal dignity or the rights of minors or which is contrary
to current legislation, or any conduct of the User which incites or constitutes a criminal
offence, is totally prohibited.\n\n
Likewise, the inclusion and communication of contents by Users which i) are false or
inaccurate or may induce error or mislead other Users or Videona’s personnel, ii) infringe
the intellectual property rights of third parties, iii) may undermine or harm the reputation or
image of Videona, iv) may be considered as illegal, misleading or unfair advertising, or
contain viruses or any other electronic element which may harm or hinder the functioning
of the Platform, the internet, IT equipment belonging to Videona or to third parties or
access to the Platform by other Users, is totally prohibited.
If the User infringes the above prohibitions/restrictions or Videona has reasonable grounds
to suspect that a User has infringed any of the same, Videona reserves the right to
suspend or terminate the User´s account and to refuse any and all current or future use of
the products, services and/or the Platform (or any portion thereof).\n\n
For further information see Videona Guidelines.\n\n
7. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS \n\n
All intellectual property rights in and to all contents within the Platform are reserved and, in
particular, it is forbidden to modify, copy, reproduce, publicly communicate, transform or
distribute in any way the totality or part of any contents included in the Platform for public
or commercial means unless with the prior, express and written authorisation of Videona
or, as the case may be, from the third party owner or rights holder of the same.\n\n
Access to and navigation through the Platform shall in no case be understood as a
relinquishment, transmission, licence or total or partial transfer of any rights by Videona
howsoever, unless otherwise expressly stated within the particular conditions which
regulates the use, provision and/or contracting of the products or services, if any, provided
through the Platform. Consequently, it is not permitted to delete, evade or manipulate any
indicators of rights ownership (for example “copyright”, “©”, “trademark” or “™” indicators)
or other identifying data, whether in favour of Videona or any other parties, and/or any
technical protection mechanisms, fingerprints or whichever information or identification
mechanisms may be contained in, or otherwise pertain to, any contents.\n\n
Any references to names and commercial or registered brands, logos or other distinctive
marks, which are owned by Videona or by others, implicitly forbid their use without the
authorisation from Videona or from the owner or the rights holder. At no time, unless
otherwise expressly stated, the access or use of the Platform and/or its contents shall give
the User any right whatsoever to the brands, logos and/or distinctive signs included in the
Platform, each of which is protected by Law.\n\n
The non authorized use and exploitation of the Platform contents or any other conduct
which may infringe any intellectual property rights, will lead to the legal responsibility as set
out within the applicable regulation.\n\n
8. LINKS\n\n
8.1 Links from the Platform to other apps or websites.\n\n
Videona may offer direct or indirect links to other apps or websites which are outside of the
Platform. The presence of these links in the Platform have a purely informative purpose
only and at no time constitute an invitation to purchase the products and/or services
offered on such websites. Furthermore, no such link implies the existence of a branch
relationship with the entity owning the website to which the link is offered. In any such
case, Videona will not be responsible for establishing general conditions to be taken into
account in the use, provision or contracting of or for any such services or products and,
therefore, Videona may not be held responsible in any way in relation with it.\n\n
Videona does not have the knowledge, human resources or technical means to control or
approve the information, contents, products or services provided by or through other
websites to which it offers a link from the Platform. Consequently, Videona will not take
any responsibility for any matters relating to such third party websites linked with the
Platform.\n\n
Notwithstanding the above, where Videona becomes aware that the activity or the
information which it links to is illegal and will lead to a crime or damage the rights or
property of third parties, it will act with the necessary diligence to delete or cease from
using the corresponding link at the earliest opportunity.\n\n
Likewise, if Users become aware of the illegality of the activities carried out through any
such third party websites, they will be under the obligation to communicate such matter to
Videona at the earliest reasonable opportunity such that Videona may evaluate the same
and act appropriately.\n\n
For the avoidance of doubt, if a “frame” is opened when accessing a certain web site,
where the logo of Videona is shown, it will not imply that Videona is the owner of the
referred web sites; the owner will be the entity referred as such within the web site.
8.2 Links from other web pages to the Platform.\n\n
If any User, entity or webpage wishes to establish a link to the Platform of any nature, they
must comply with the following conditions:\n\n
(i) They will need to obtain previous, express and written authorisation from Videona or
being authorised by any Videona specific conditions.\n\n
(ii) On the website from which the link is established, unless with Videona’s express
prior written approval, no declaration of any nature may be made to the effect that
Videona has authorised the link. If the entity providing the link from its webpage to
the Platform wishes to include on its own webpage any brand, denomination,
commercial name, label, logo or any other sign which identifies Videona and/or the
Platform, they must obtain previous, express and written authorisation from Videona.
(iii) Videona forbids the link to the Platform from all those webpages which contain
materials, information or contents which are illegal, degrading, obscene and, in
general, which infringe upon morality, public order, current legislation, generally
accepted social rules or which harm the legitimate rights of third parties.\n\n
9. PRIVACY\n\n
When it is required the User’s register or the collection of personal data (in order to access
services, subscribe to newsletters, carry out any registration process or request
information, among others), the User will be alerted as to the need to provide his/her
personal data.\n\n
In any event, the collection and processing of personal data will be carried out in
compliance with the requirements of the applicable data protection regulations as well as
the Privacy Policy which forms an integral part of this Legal Notice.\n\n
10. DURATION AND MODIFICATION\n\n
Videona reserves the right to modify this Legal Notice and the particular terms and
conditions which may have been established for the use and/or contracting of the products
and services provided through the Platform, whenever it considers it appropriate and/or in
order to adapt and comply with any changes in legislation and in technology which have
become effective since the last publication of the same on the Platform.\n\n
The term of this Legal Notice coincides with the duration of its publication and exhibition in
the Platform, until such time as it is totally or partially modified. At such moment, the
modified terms and conditions will become binding.\n\n
11. COMMUNICATIONS\n\n
The User must contact with Videona through the postal and/or email address provided on
the Platform. Communications from Videona to the User must comply with the contact
information provided by the User. The User therefore expressly accepts the use of the
email address provided as a valid means for the exchange of information between
Videona and the User.\n\n
11. MISCELLANEOUS\n\n
The Legal Notice includes the following documents:\n\n
(i) Videona Guidelines\n\n
(ii) Privacy Policy\n\n
(iii) Particular Terms And Conditions\n\n
The headings of the different sections herein only have an informative nature and do not
affect, qualify or modify the interpretation of this Legal Notice.\n\n
Where there is any discrepancy between the effects of this Legal Notice and the particular
terms and conditions which may be established in relation to any specific products or
services offered in the Platform, the latter will prevail.\n\n
If one of the provisions laid down in this Legal Notice is considered void or as not being
totally or partially binding by a Court of Law or by a recognised Administrative body, such
nullity will not affect the other provisions contained in this Legal Notice nor any other
provisions which have been established.\n\n
Where Videona does not exercise any of the rights contained in this Legal Notice, such
event will not constitute a relinquishment of this right, unless expressly stated in writing.\n\n
13. GOVERNING LAW AND JURISDICTION.\n\n
This Legal Notice, and any relationship arising out of its acceptance or related hereto, shall
be governed exclusively by the laws of Spain.\n\n
The courts located in the city of Madrid (Spain) shall have exclusive jurisdiction to
adjudicate any dispute arising out of or relating to this Legal Notice and/or any relationship
arising out of its acceptance. Each party hereby irrevocably consents to the exclusive
jurisdiction of such courts.\n\n
© 2015 VIDEONA SOCIALMEDIA, S.L. All rights reserved.\n\n

This Privacy Policy is part of the Platform´s Legal Notice.\n\n
In accordance with the current data protection regulations, VIDEONA SOCIALMEDIA,
S.L. (hereinafter, Videona) informs that any personal data belonging to the User,
collected and/or provided through the mobile app or the webpages www.videona.es
and www.videona.com (hereinafter, the Platform) will be processed by Videona
according to this Privacy Policy.\n\n
1. COLLECTION AND USE OF THE PERSONAL DATA\n\n
1.1 The personal data collected by Videona is classified in two groups:\n\n
 Data provided by the User. Personal data such as name, email, photo,
address, etc., are voluntarily provided by Users during the registration process,
when buying on the Platform or contacting Videona.\n\n
 Data collected automatically. Some data may be obtained automatically
during the use of the Platform. Among the information collected automatically it
is the IP address, the mobile GPS location, mobile device features, the data
provided by sensors, the date and time of access to the Platform, the source
(URL), time of use and page views and preferences of each User (see
"Cookies" below).\n\n
1.2. Such data will be used, among others, for the following purposes:\n\n
 Managing the User´s registration process;\n\n
 Managing the purchasing process in the Marketplace;\n\n
 Providing Users with information about the services offered through the
Platform;\n\n
 Providing Users with adverts based on their interest and preferences;\n\n
 Managing requests for information, complaints and claims from Users;\n\n
 Sending notifications to Users about their Videos activities and positioning;\n\n
 Conducting studies and statistics about the use of the Platform.\n\n
1.3 In addition, Users will be provided with commercial communications sent by
electronic means, with regard to products and services which may be of the User´s
interest. The User can refuse the reception of the mentioned communications, notifying
Videona by sending an email to legal@videona.com, with the reference “Privacy” or by
clicking on the unsubscribe link available in the electronic commercial communications
sent by email. \n\n
1.4 If Videona requests and the User provides an email address, a mobile telephone
number or any other means of electronic communication, the User expressly
authorises Videona to use such means as a way of communicating with the User, as a
way to fulfil the abovementioned purposes, as well as to provide the User with any
relevant changes which are made on or to the Platform.\n\n
1.5 Users are entirely responsible for the accuracy, authenticity, currency and
completeness of the data that they provide and are entirely responsible for any loss,
damages or penalties that may result from any failure by them to meet such
responsibility.\n\n
1.6 In addition, in order to meet the above responsibility regarding accuracy, it is also
the Users’ responsibility to notify Videona of any modification or change regarding data
previously provided.\n\n
2. MINIMUM AGE\n\n
The User must be over 14 years old to register in and use the Platform. Videona may
use your personal information to verify your age and ensure compliance with this
restriction.\n\n
3. COOKIES\n\n
3.1. Videona uses first and third parties cookies for collecting information regarding
Users’ use or navigation on the Platform with the purpose to develop statistical and
analytical works. In particular, the use of cookies allows Videona server recognizes IP
address connections, the source (URL), time of use, page views and preferences of
each user.\n\n
3.2. Videona also uses first party cookies, which uniquely identify the Users during a
session to show private and/or customized information. These cookies are necessary
for the Platform’s operation.\n\n
3.3. Videona also uses targeting cookies, which store information about browsing
habits of the Users, allowing us to develop a specific profile for display advertising.\n\n
3.4. Cookies are files sent to the browser by a web server in order to record users’
activities during their navigation and interaction with the Platform. Users have the ability
to configure their browsers to be notified of the reception of cookies and prevent their
installation. If you block or disable the cookies you can still use the Platform, but the
use some of its services may be limited.\n\n
Please consult the instructions and manuals of your browser for more information.\n\n
4. SECURITY\n\n
The processing of personal data is carried out in compliance with requirements laid
down by the applicable regulations and, in particular, with the obligation of keeping the
data confidential and secret. Specifically, Videona ensures that the appropriate security
measures have been adopted in order to avoid any change, loss or non-authorised
access, as well as any harm to personal data and registered information.\n\n
5. CONTACT\n\n
Users are granted with the rights to access, rectify, cancel and object the process of
their personal data. These rights can be exercised by sending an email
legal@videona.com, attaching a copy of User’s DNI/Passport. The communication
must be sent with the subject “Ref. Privacy”,\n\n
© 2015 VIDEONA SOCIALMEDIA S.L. All rights reserved.

PLEASE READ CAREFULLY THE FOLLOWING GUIDELINES. THE USE OF THE
VIDEONA SERVICES IMPLIES YOUR PRIOR, EXPRESS AND COMPLETE
ACCEPTANCE OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS HEREIN.
IF YOU DOES NOT AGREE WITH THESE GUIDELINES DO NOT USE THE
SERVICES.\n\n
THESE GUIDELINES ARE PART OF THE PLATFORM\´S LEGAL NOTICE.\n\n
1. GENERAL RULES\n\n
The User shall use the Service, according to the following rules, and assuming any
responsibility arising out of their infringement\n\n
1. Access to the Service: User shall not access the Service by any means other than
the interface provided by Videona.\n\n
2. User Identity: The User shall not misrepresent his/her identity impersonating any
other person, a non-existent person or a member of any entity, nor lie about his/her
affiliation with any other person and/or entity.\n\n
3. Respect other Users: User shall neither stalk nor harass any third party, nor collect,
store and/or assign personal data about other Users infringing the current
regulation on data protection. User shall not make available to third parties for any
purpose, the data captured from distribution lists.\n\n
Users agree and acknowledge that all information, data, text, music, sound, images,
graphics, video, messages and other materials ("Content"), publicly posted and publicly
accessible to the Users via the Service, are the sole responsibility of the person who
includes such Content in the Service.\n\n
This means that Users are entirely and exclusively responsible for all the Content that it
is uploaded, posted or otherwise transmitted through the Services. Under no
circumstances Videona will be liable in any way for any Content uploaded, posted or
otherwise transmitted through the Services. \n\n
Videona does not control or monitor the Content posted and/or published by Users via
the Services and, therefore, does not guarantee the accuracy, integrity and/or quality of
such Content. However, Videona may be required to monitor such Content (i.e,
required to do so by law or competent authority) and, in any case, Videona reserves
the right to block and/or eliminate any Content accessible through the Service which
may infringe this Guidelines, any Particular Terms and Conditions or the Legal Notice.
The User agrees and consents that Videona may access, preserve, and disclose
his/her account information and Content: (a) for the purpose of properly administering
the User’s account; and (b) if required to do so by law or competent authority, or if such
access, is reasonably necessary to: (i) comply with legal process; (ii) enforce the Legal
Notice and/or the Particular Terms and Conditions; or (iii) respond to claims that any
Content infringes third-parties’ rights. \n\n
7. PROHIBITIONS\n\n
The User agrees to properly use the Service and to not use it for illegal or unlawful
purposes or purposes contrary to the good faith or the public order. In detail, User is
banned from the following:\n\n
a) Upload, post, send or otherwise transmit any Content that is unlawful, harmful,
threatening, abusive, vulgar, obscene, pornographic, defamatory, discriminator,
invasive of other\'s privacy or objectionable for racial or ethnical reasons; \n\n
b) Harm minors in any way or upload, post, send or otherwise transmit any
Content that incorporates images of minors without the consent of their parents
or legal guardians.\n\n
c) Threatening, stalking or harassing other Users;\n\n
d) Upload, post, email or otherwise transmit any Content that incites or
encourages the hate or the practice of illegal, violent or animal cruelty acts.\n\n
e) Publish, communicate, extract, collect, process or store personal data about
other Users;\n\n
f) Impersonate any person or entity or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your
affiliation with a person or entity; \n\n
g) Forge headers or otherwise manipulate identifiers in order to disguise the origin
of any Content transmitted through the Services; \n\n
h) Upload, post, send or otherwise transmit any Content that the User does not
have rights to do so; \n\n
i) Upload, post, send or otherwise transmit any Content that infringes any patent,
trademark, trade secret, copyright or other proprietary rights; \n\n
j) Upload, post, send or otherwise transmit any Content that infringes images
rights of third parties.\n\n
k) Upload, post, send or otherwise transmit any unsolicited or unauthorised
advertising, promotional materials, "junk mail," "spam," "chain letters," "pyramid
schemes," or any other form of non-authorized solicitation; \n\n
l) Upload, post, email or otherwise transmit any material destined to the practice
of "phishing" or that contains software viruses or any other computer code, files
or programs designed to interrupt, damage, destroy or limit the functionality of
any software or hardware or telecommunications equipment; \n\n
m) Use or apply any technical, software or technology resources whereby Users
can benefit, directly or indirectly, with or without profit, from the unauthorized
exploitation of the Service. \n\n
3. REPORTING \n\n
Users may denounce the Content that violates these Guidelines through the "Report"
button underneath them. To report profiles and any other Content, users must send an
email to legal@videona.com, with the subject "Reporting". In both reporting channels,
users must indicate the reasons why they consider that there is an infringement of
these Guidelines.\n\n
© 2015 VIDEONA SOCIALMEDIA S.L. All rights reserved.

string.name: particularTermsAndConditionsOfVideonaTitle
string.u: Particular Terms and Conditions of Videona

resources.string:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY THE FOLLOWING PARTICULAR TERMS AND
CONDITIONS. YOUR USE OF THE SERVICES DESCRIBED BELOW WILL IMPLY
YOUR PRIOR, EXPRESS AND COMPLETE ACCEPTANCE OF THE TERMS AND
CONDITIONS HEREIN.\n\n
IF YOU DOES NOT AGREE WITH THESE PARTICULAR TERMS AND
CONDITIONS DO NOT USE THE SERVICES.
THESE PARTICULAR TERMS AND CONDITIONS ARE PART OF THE WEBSITE´S
LEGAL NOTICE.\n\n
1. PURPOSE\n\n
The purpose of these Particular Terms and Conditions is to regulate the use of the
Videona platform (hereafter, the Service).\n\n
The Service is intended solely for Users older 14 years who are not legally prohibited
from receiving or using the Service under the laws of their country of residence or from
which they access or use the Service. If you are more than 14 years old, but is a minor
(under the laws of your country), you must have permission of your parents or legal
guardians to use the Service.\n\n
Users who are minors or who do not have the legal capacity to understand and accept
these Terms and Conditions, as well as to fulfill the obligations herewith, have
restricted the use of part of the Service.\n\n
2. SCOPE\n\n
The use of the Service does not require being previously registered. However, to
perform certain actions, it is necessary to have made the download of the application
and/or be a registered User.\n\n
For the purposes of these Terms and Conditions:\n\n
 “Content” are the Videos and the Features created by Users and uploaded on
the Platform.\n\n
 “Copyright Licenses” are the intellectual property licenses granted by Users for
the Videos embedded in the Platform. These licenses can be configured for all
Videos included in a profile or be applied to each one individually.\n\n
 “Features” are software packs with filters, sound and visual effects, transitions
and other of Platform extra features, used in creating and editing videos.\n\n
 “Marketplace” is the online store where users can purchase Features, storage
space and other Platform functionalities/services, as well as advertise and sell
Content.\n\n
 "Privacy Settings" are the parameters set by the user about the level of privacy
that their profile and their videos are on the Platform. Users can determine
whether the videos are public or private and the Users authorized to view them.\n\n
 “Videos” are the individual videos that Users can upload in the Service.\n\n
 “Videopoints” are the Videona virtual currency, used to purchase items in the
Marketplace.\n\n
3. REGISTRATION AND PROFILE CREATION\n\n
For using all the functionalities of the Platform the User must create a profile using the
registration form or importing the personal data from other social networks. After the
registration, Videona will send you an email with a link you must click to confirm your
Profile.\n\n
The Users can edit the Profile at any time by modifying their personal data and
changing their options or preferences. Through the Profile you may modify the Privacy
Settings and the Copyright Licenses, manage your Content and access statistics
related to them.\n\n
4. CREATION, HOSTING AND POSTING VIDEOS\n\n
4.1 Scope\n\n
To upload, edit, publish, host, share, rate and recommend videos Users must
download the Application and make its register on Videona.\n\n
To play and share Videos the prior registration or the download of the Application are
not necessary.\n\n
4.2 Recording, editing, hosting and publishing Videos\n\n
Registered users can record and edit Videos through the Application using free or
purchased Features. Once finished the Video edition, Users can upload it in the
Platform, establishing the Privacy Settings and the Copyright Licenses granted on it.
Videona reserves the right to set limits on the amount of storage space for Videos that
each User can use.\n\n
The Videos uploaded by Users and any other Contents published by them must follow
the Videona Guidelines.\n\n
4.3 Licenses\n\n
4.3.1. License to other Users\n\n
Users expressly authorize that all or part of the Videos uploaded by them in the Service
can be viewed, reproduced or used by other Users, as well as can be incorporated into
the profiles that a User can have in social networks and other websites for personal or
non-commercial purposes. This authorization is conditioned to the Privacy Settings of
the Video.\n\n
Users may grant additional licenses by choosing in their Profiles the Copyright License
from a list provided by Videona. The Copyright Licenses provided for Videona are
Creative Commons.\n\n
Users can edit the Copyright Licenses at any time in their Profiles. Such license
change may take two (2) business days to be reflected publicly on the Platform.
Consequently, the duration of the Copyright Licenses previously granted will be
extended until changes are made public.\n\n
The User expressly acknowledges and accepts that changes on the Copyright
Licenses shall not apply to the Videos previously downloaded by Users through the
Platform.\n\n
4.3.2. License to Videona\n\n
With respect to the Videos uploaded and published through the Service, the Users
grant to Videona a worldwide nonexclusive and free of charges license to use,
reproduce, adapt, publicly perform and make available electronically these Videos in
whole or in part for (i) showing the videos through the Platform; (ii) displaying videos on
websites and third party applications; and (iii) allowing others Users to reproduce,
download and embed videos on websites of third parties, in accordance with the
Privacy Settings.\n\n
4.3.3. License duration\n\n
The licenses granted by the Users shall remain valid for the period of time that Users
keep the Videos in the Service or until Users delete their Profiles. Notwithstanding the
foregoing, Videona reserves the right to retain Videos in case of disputes,
investigations and legal proceedings or when may arise responsibilities to Videona
from the Service.\n\n
5. ADVERTISEMENT, SALE AND DOWNLOAD OF VIDEOS FOR USERS\n\n
Registered Users (hereinafter Advertiser) may offer the purchase of Videos by other
Users through the Platform. The Advertiser must be of legal age or have the legal
capacity, licenses, authorizations and other legal requirements applicable to the sale
thereof.\n\n
To announce the sale of Videos, the Advertiser shall indicate (i) the price of the Video;
and (ii) the Copyright Licenses granted. The Videos will be promoted on the
Marketplace, through which registered Users can indicate their interest in acquiring
them and contact with the Advertisers.\n\n
Videona provides to Advertisers the possibility of allowing the download of Videos for
Users interested on them.\n\n
Videos shall be announced/sold under the sole responsibility of the User, who
guarantees the truthfulness and accuracy of the information published. Users are liable
for any action, claim or demand relating to the sale/announcement of the Video, leaving
unscathed Videona if such actions, claims or demands are directly against Videona.
Videona merely provides to Users the use of the platform for (i) announcing the sale of
their Videos, (ii) contacting the Users interested in purchasing/selling the Videos (iii)
enabling the download of the Videos to Users who acquire them. Videona does not
manage the trading or sale or intermediate between the Advertiser and the buyers of
the Videos and does not control or supervise any of the sales.\n\n
The use the Service of selling Videos for any purpose other than expressly provided in
this section is prohibited.\n\n
6. CREATION AND SALE OF FEATURES FOR USERS\n\n
6.1. Scope\n\n
Registered Users can create and selling filters, effects and transitions (hereinafter
"Users Features"), using the tools and resources provided by Videona through the
Application. For this purpose, Users must be of legal age and have legal capacity to
understand and accept these Conditions, as well as comply with the obligations set
forth herein (hereinafter the Seller).\n\n
Users Features may be purchased only by registered Users. The acquisition of Users
Features is subject also to the "Marketplace Purchase Conditions ".\n\n
The use the Service of creation and sale of Features for any purpose other than
expressly provided in this section is prohibited.\n\n
6.2 Remuneration\n\n
The Users Features will be sold from the Application for prices in Videopoints
established by Videona. After five (5) working days from the date of the purchase,
Videona shall transfer to the Seller the amount in Videopoints, corresponding to fifty
percent (50%) of the price of the Feature, as a remuneration for the sale.\n\n
The Profile closure implies the renunciation by the Seller of the compensation for the
sales.\n\n
6.3 License\n\n
Regarding the Features created and offered for sale, User grant to Videona a
worldwide, royalty-free, nonexclusive and transferable to third parties license to use,
reproduce, modify, change, adapt, create summaries, create derivative works, publicly
communicate and make available electronically such Features in whole or in part, in
order to allow their use according to the specific functionalities of the Service. This
license does not confer the right to compensation or any benefit, with the exception of
the remuneration provided in section 6.2.\n\n
This license is valid for the period of time that a User keeps the Features for sale,
finishing at the time in which the Features are eliminated or suppressed from the
Service or withdrawn from sale. The license shall remain in force in the event that a
User is deregistered the Service without removing or deleting the Feature.\n\n
The withdrawal of the sale may take two (2) business days to be reflected in the
Marketplace, so the duration of the license shall be extended until the Features are no
longer publicly available. The cancellation of the license does not affect the rights of
Users who have purchased the Features before the cessation of it.\n\n
Seller acknowledges that Videona is under no obligation to use, distribute or market the
Users Features. Videona reserves the right to restrict or remove Users Features at its
discretion.\n\n
7. ACQUISITION OF VIDEOPOINTS\n\n
7.1. Scope\n\n
Users can acquire Videopoints through the selling of Features, from Videona awards or
by purchasing them.\n\n
In order to buy Videopoints, Users must be of legal age or have the legal capacity to
understand and accept these Conditions, as well as comply with the obligations set
forth herein (hereinafter the Buyer).\n\n
7.2. Videopoints purchase process\n\n
Buyers can purchase the amount of Videopoints in which they are interested, providing
the data and the information requested during the process.\n\n
Once completed the purchase process, the Buyer will receive the order confirmation
via email (to the address used by the User to register), the charge of the purchase
amount will be made through the payment method chosen and finally, the Videopoints
will be credited in the Videopoints Balance available in the User Profile. The User will
receive the purchase receipt through email.\n\n
The deadline for the delivery of Videopoints may vary according to the payment
method chosen and it will be previously notified to the Buyer, before the purchase order
conclusion.\n\n
7.3. Economic Conditions\n\n
Buyers must pay the price or value of the Videopoints, which will include VAT and/or
any taxes that may apply. Also, if there is any discount, price increase or additional
fees (e.g., ancillary services, financing or use of payment methods), the Purchaser will
be informed of the total price by breaking down the previous amounts, prior to the
formalization of the purchase order.\n\n
Videopoints purchases are non-refundable.\n\n
7.4 Privacy Policy\n\n
The collection and processing of personal data will be held according to the Privacy
Policy terms.\n\n
Additionally, customers’ data can be communicated to payment methods or gateways,
in order to complete the purchase.\n\n
7.5 Videopoints Balance\n\n
The "Videopoints Balance” is the amount of Videopoints available on the User’s Profile.
This balance can only be used to purchase Items and other Services or Content in the
platform.\n\n
The Videopoints Balance is non-refundable, non-transferable and has no cash value.
The Videopoints Balance shall not expire while the User keeps his profile. If a User
cancels his Profile shall loses the right to use the Videopoints Balance and cannot
claim in no case reimbursement of it in cash.\n\n
8. MARKETPLACE PURCHASE CONDITIONS\n\n
8.1. Scope\n\n
The purpose of the Service is to allow the purchase of Features, storage space and
any other content/services available on the Marketplace (hereinafter, Item).\n\n
8.2. Items purchase process\n\n
Buyers can purchase a license or download an Item exchanging their Videopoints. In
order to do it, Buyers must select the desired Item and follow the instructions during the
process.\n\n
Once completed the purchase process, the Buyer will receive the order confirmation
via email (to the address used by the User to register in the Platform), the charge of the
purchase amount will be done on the Videopoints Balance in the User’s Profile and
automatically will enable the use of the Item.\n\n
The Item purchases are non-refundable.\n\n
Buyers may make use of legal safeguards applicable when they are applicable to the
Item.\n\n
9. SOFTWARE LICENSE\n\n
In order to access all the Services available on the Platform, Users shall download and
install the Application on their mobile device.\n\n
Videona grants to Users a personal, revocable, non-exclusive and non-transferable
license to download and use the Application software exclusively for the use of the
Services under these Particular Terms and Conditions. The software shall not be used,
copied, reproduced, transmitted, displayed, distributed, sold, licensed, downloaded or
otherwise exploited in any way different from the Service’s operation. Users may not do
reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble or otherwise create source codes from the
software.\n\n
Regarding to the Application tool and functionalities that allow Users to create
Features, Videona grants to Users a license to use, reproduce and prepare derivative
works exclusively for the creation and sale of Features, under these Particular Terms
and Conditions.\n\n
© 2015 VIDEONA SOCIALMEDIA S.L. All rights reserved.
